message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?  This is a very fair price for a product of this quality.
